= How to do stuff =

 * disable laptop keyboard
  {{{
  xinput list

  xinput float ID

  xinput reattach ID SLAVE_ID
  }}}

  * copy text from tmux to clipboard
{{{
  xclip -sel clip < ~/.ssh/key.pub
}}}

  * how to get commands from history
{{{
  history | grep string

  fc -e vim 12345 # it will run the command after exiting vim
}}}
